titles.title: A bill to amend Bankruptcy Rule 7004 to require that service of process on an insured depository institution be made by personal service on an officer of the institution.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S707-708)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 1/26/1993--Introduced. Amends Federal bankruptcy rules to provide that service of process on an insured depository institution shall be made by personal service on an officer of the institution.
